response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item carries a unique value of $12,000 to me, reflecting its quality, craftsmanship, and the dedication of our team behind it. I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $10,500. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for unparalleled quality. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this extraordinary acquisition.", "product_price": 10500}
